locations.name: Nairobi
locations.description: Initial location offering a gentle introduction to Kenya's vibrant energy.

locations.name: Laikipia Conservancy
locations.description: A private conservancy in the Laikipia region, known for pioneering conservation, exclusivity, night drives, bush walks, and unique species.

locations.name: Maasai Mara Conservancy
locations.description: A private conservancy bordering the main Maasai Mara reserve, offering an intimate experience with high wildlife concentration, especially during the Great Migration.

locations.name: Zanzibar
locations.description: An exotic island destination for relaxation, featuring beaches, the Indian Ocean, and historic Stone Town.
